titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ethel M. Roberts of Newark, Ohio.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2639)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/9/1994--Introduced. Deems the 1989 marriage of two named individuals to be null ab initio and entitles the former wife to a former spouse annuity based upon their 1950 marriage and the election by her husband of such former spouse annuity on January 1, 1988.
